dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: {npc.name} doesn't seem to notice you and continues to stare in the direction of the ruins north...

part.name: Tortwald's Letter
part.info: You have found the guard Tortwald Howell imprisoned deep inside the Underground City. He has asked you to deliver a letter to his love, Rienn Howell, in Fort Ghzal.

dialog.name: who
dialog.message: I'm {npc.name}, a guard from Fort Ghzal...

dialog.name: doing
dialog.message: I was captured by the creatures living in this terrible place... I don't know what they want to do with me...

dialog.name: help
dialog.message: No... I'm too weak to escape... And these bars are impervious to everything I have tried... But... Would you, please, deliver a letter to my wife in Fort Ghzal for me...?

response.message: I said no! I don't have time for your sniveling.

dialog.name: sure
dialog.message: Thank you... Here's the letter. Please, deliver it to my wife, Rienn Howell in Fort Ghzal...

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: *sobs*... Have you delivered the letter yet?

dialog.name: working
dialog.message: Please, deliver it to my wife, Rienn Howell in Fort Ghzal...

response.message: Here, take this letter from your husband...

dialog.name: takeletter
dialog.message: Oh! He has been gone for a long time now...
Thank you, adventurer... Please, take this letter and deliver it to him...

part.name: Rienn's Letter
part.info: After delivering Tortwald Howell's letter to Rienn Howell, she has asked you to deliver a letter of her own to Tortwald.

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: *sobs*... Have you delivered the letter yet?

response.message: Yes, take this letter from your wife.

dialog.name: takeletter
dialog.message: You have a letter for me from my dear Rienn? Oh... thank you...
Here, take this key... it supposedly opens something around here, but before I could figure it out, I was captured... and... thank you again.
